name: Office-based
description: Work performed primarily in an office environment.

name: Remote
description: Work performed entirely from a remote location, typically from home.

name: Hybrid
description: Work performed both in the office and remotely, often on a flexible schedule.

name: On-site
description: Work that requires presence at a specific physical location or site.

name: Flexible
description: Work that allows employees to choose their working hours and location, offering maximum flexibility.

name: Shift work
description: Work where employees are scheduled in shifts, often for 24-hour operations.
